nodes.text: The Gambler's Quest is a short comic that appeared in Star Wars Kids 12. It was written and drawn by Robert Rath.

The story revolves around Lando Calrissian under the alias of Tamtel Skreej as he is trying to earn a recommendation to be placed in the palace as an ordinary guard. Lando has to pass certain "tests" such as leaping across the rancor pit and stealing Krayt dragon eggs to become one of Jabba's personal guards. Boba Fett himself acts as a referee and judge for Lando's trials. One of the four pages is a puzzle/maze game for kids to play.
